instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no picture but sound coming out from speakers
threads.message: Hi. i got <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b board where was problem with display like always in 2011 15 inch macs. i replaced 3 chipsets but now is no picture at all but i can hear sound on start up. checked two working screens and is not that. also is not a backlight for sure, i checked with lamp. any idea where to start find why i dont have picture  but replaced 3 new chipsets?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no picture but sound coming out from speakers
threads.message: You fucked up replacing the "chipsets". What are you replacing anyway? Only thing that needs replacing is the GPU on these.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no picture but sound coming out from speakers
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no picture but sound coming out from speakers
threads.message: Yes and I mean you fucked up replacing it. Pull and reball a new chip with lead.
